body:
Thanks for your contribution!
The community will review it ASAP. In the meanwhile, please checkout [the coding standard](https://echarts.apache.org/en/coding-standard.html) and Wiki about [How to make a pull request](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/wiki/How-to-make-a-pull-request).

The pull request is marked to be `PR: author is committer` because you are a committer of this project.
I've tried to fix this bug. Could you please refer to https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/pull/12392 for details and provide some idea at will? 🙂
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
@100pah,我们现在业务也需要导出echarts图表到excel,尤其是常规的柱状图,折线图和饼图,在不请求后端的情况下无法做到啊,请问什么时候能出一个导出echarts图表到excel的功能啊

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵

Another question,
Before, when setting `symbol` in `makrLine`, two symbols with different directions will be created as shown below
![螢幕快照 2020-04-08 上午10 37 16](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54794351/78738814-5dd3e300-7985-11ea-8482-c737eeabd12b.png)

![螢幕快照 2020-04-08 上午10 38 38](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54794351/78738873-865bdd00-7985-11ea-8a53-dc2f3059bcc4.png)
Just wonder is this expected?

This is an issue for me too. Tried to make gradient work for areas in pieces, but making area color to a gradient does not work. Only option to make gradients work would be to split areas into multiple separate series and set a different background gradient for those. The library is so flexible that this might be doable?

我觉得官方表达有问题，不是整个options = []，而是在各对象中[]，如options.title=[]
见 https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=scatter-anscombe-quartet

这个宽度，Canvas 的绘制跟浏览器和硬件会有很大的关系了（我刚在高分屏上用 35000 的分辨率显示就崩溃了，因为要分配的内存太大了）

你的数据量大概是多少？如果可以的话可以试试开启 sampling，我刚试了 100w 的数据，开启 sampling 后交互也是挺流畅的

Hi @bingyubing 

Can you provide a reproducible demo? I can't reproduce it in my environment or in the [examples](https://www.echartsjs.com/examples/zh/editor.html?c=bar3d-dataset&gl=1) page.
x 轴的类目不要有重复的数据，不然在索引的时候没法找到正确的值。如果需要显示上一样，可以通过 formatter 实现

> 试试用 svg 渲染？ 卡的原因定位为通过markpoint画的红绿点以及色域和一些描述，它们和时间轴绑定了的。单纯是线的时候拖动还是很流畅。请问还有其他方向实现这种效果吗？ > sampling 这是用slider实现的滚动条，但是在拖动时会很卡

## 一个实际的使用场景
### 第一次通过位置计算，得到的图形如下
此时外圆半径R = r内圆半径，可以明显看到边缘节点的重叠很厉害，于是试图修改边缘节点的半径，来减轻重叠的情况
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20412044/78756197-fb8ed880-79ac-11ea-9de1-9d4f2755ed30.png)

### 第二次通过位置计算，得到的图形如下
此时外圆半径R =4r 内圆半径。
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20412044/78756538-85d73c80-79ad-11ea-8d48-96d2373e85cb.png)


两次计算中r始终没有发生变化，但是实际得到的图形中，内圆节点的位置明显发生了变化，导致整个图形看起来不是很合理。
在issues里面搜索了下相关问题，似乎很多人都询问过相同的问题，但是一直没有解答？
splitArea里面的color，没有办法用formatter和function吧。x轴的类目修改成不重复的数据，还是一样的。
另外，补充一下，使用`layout:force`，然后节点配置`fixed`也是一样的效果。

我也遇到了同样的问题，求解答

> 这个宽度，Canvas 的绘制跟浏览器和硬件会有很大的关系了（我刚在高分屏上用 35000 的分辨率显示就崩溃了，因为要分配的内存太大了） > > 你的数据量大概是多少？如果可以的话可以试试开启 sampling，我刚试了 100w 的数据，开启 sampling 后交互也是挺流畅的 现在我们考虑用多个canvas组合起来使用，测试用了40个canvas目前没有问题，不知道会不会有其他的坑
官方工具已经崩了。 请自行寻找数据

THX! That's not expected. I've made a fix for it, now it should work well. A default rotation action would be performed if `symbolRotate` is not specified(undefined or null) or `NaN`.  You can refer to this commit https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/pull/12392/commits/f949aebae88fd518711a67ca2b6812ec44689494 for more details.

It works well!
Just come up with an idea, since `symbol` supports `Array` as value, to set `fromSymbol`and `toSymbol`, is it possible `Array` is also supported for `symbolRotate` to set `fromSymbol` & `toSymbol`'s rotation?
Like below
```js
markLine: {
  symbol: 'triangle',
  symbolRotate: [0, 180]
}
```

### 到现在依旧无法展示legend.

 尝试过手动设置`legend`中的`data`与`series`中的每项`name`一致，可以显示legend。
 
 但是点击legend切换就会出现一下问题：
* 第一次点击可以隐藏对应的series的扇区

* 再次点击legen想显示series时却无法显示

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵
